description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   New Features   
   
   DIAGRAMNET-50018-Add support of CLS compliant
   DIAGRAMNET-51143-Ability to get the group of a given shape
   DIAGRAMNET-51144-Ability to get the parent of a given shape
     
    Bugs  

   DIAGRAMNET-50149-VSD to PDF conversion, the background color shade of a group shape is getting changed
   DIAGRAMNET-50579-VSDX to PDF conversion, incorrect background color of the shape
   DIAGRAMNET-50984-The border lines of the table are missing on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-50985-The text items are not aligned properly on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-50999-Rendering incorrect color of shapes on converting a VSD to PNG  
   DIAGRAMNET-51002-HTMLSaveOptions.DefaultFont property does not work as expected
   DIAGRAMNET-51049-The color of shapes is not being rendered correctly on converting a VSD to HTML   
   DIAGRAMNET-51080-The wrong text alignment of shapes on saving in EMF
   DIAGRAMNET-51132-The rounded shape corners are being changed on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51133-The layout of dynamic arrow connector is changed on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51135-The Visio shapes are displaced on converting a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51136-The vertical text appears as horizontal text on converting a VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51138-An error occurred in loading a VSDX diagram
   DIAGRAMNET-51139-Can't access file error occurred on converting a VSDX to HTML
   DIAGRAMNET-51140-Vertical text box is overhanging the edge of the node while converting VSDX to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51148-NullReferenceException at Diagram.Save while converting VSD to HTML
   DIAGRAMNET-51149-NullReferenceException at Diagram.Save when CustomProp.Name property is not set
   DIAGRAMNET-51150-Symbol has been misplaced while rendering VSD to PDF
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
